description: MCP Server for vmanomaly - VictoriaMetrics anomaly detection

environmentVariables.name: VMANOMALY_BEARER_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Bearer token for authenticating with vmanomaly API

environmentVariables.name: VMANOMALY_HEADERS
environmentVariables.description: Custom HTTP headers for vmanomaly requests (comma-separated key=value pairs, e.g., X-Custom-Header=value1,X-Another=value2)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_SERVER_MODE
environmentVariables.description: MCP server mode: stdio (default), sse, or http

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LISTEN_ADDR
environmentVariables.description: Listen address for SSE/HTTP modes (default: localhost:8080)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Log level: debug, info (default), warn, or error

environmentVariables.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable
